project.name: Ring Platform
project.one_liner: React 19 + Next 15 professional networking with entities, opportunities, messaging, and a confidential tier; Firebase-first, ConnectPlatform-compatible, Web3-ready.

lib.api_client_status: ✅ ACTIVE - Migrated hooks: useWalletBalance, useNotifications, useMessages, auth server actions

auth.server_usage: auth() on server components and API handlers
auth.route_protection: enforce via middleware.ts and server-side checks

entities.description: Organization profiles with verification and tiered visibility

opportunities.description: Offers and requests with tiered access

store.description: Adapter-driven catalog, cart, checkout, orders with Firebase-first backend and ConnectPlatform compatibility

data_access.read_write: use services/* and lib/api-client.ts; avoid ad-hoc Firestore/Auth calls

realtime_files.push_notifications: FCM + WebSocket push with React 19 optimizations
realtime_files.migration_status: ✅ WebSocket migration completed - modern React 19 architecture

do: use services/* facades and lib/* helpers
prefer server-side auth() and middleware enforcement
use WebSocket hooks for real-time features
subscribe to notification channels via WebSocket
use RingApiClient for all client-side API calls with timeout and retry
implement structured error handling with ApiClientError
configure domain-specific timeout and retry settings
dont: perform ad-hoc Firestore/Auth calls from components
use polling for real-time data (use WebSocket push instead)
use raw fetch() for API calls (use RingApiClient instead)
implement custom timeout/retry logic (use RingApiClient built-in features)

ai_hints.access_enforcement: always compute user tier and filter data accordingly
ai_hints.ssr_auth: call auth() in server actions, route handlers, and server components
ai_hints.client_data: fetch via services/* -> lib/api-client.ts; cache where appropriate
ai_hints.schema_first: define/extend Zod schemas and converters before data ops
ai_hints.compatibility_note: code against service facades to keep Firebase/ConnectPlatform compatible
ai_hints.websocket_usage: use useWebSocketNotifications() hook for real-time notifications, avoid polling
ai_hints.realtime_patterns: subscribe to channels, handle connection state, implement proper cleanup
ai_hints.api_client_usage: use RingApiClient for all client-side API calls with domain-specific timeout configurations
ai_hints.error_handling: implement structured error handling with ApiClientError for consistent user experience
ai_hints.timeout_configs: configure timeouts based on operation type: wallet (15s), auth (15s), messaging (10s), notifications (8s)
